item.description:
Because running isn't all we're good at...

You're invited to join fellow TMIRCE members (who aren't running) at the New Balance Reach the Beach Massachusetts relay!

The race starts at Wachusett Mountain Ski area in Westminster, MA and ends at Horseneck Beach State Reservation. Along the way, there are 36 Transition Areas or TA’s (ours is TA23), where the runners hand off the baton between their teammates. The TA’s are staffed by volunteers who manage the flow of vehicles and runners coming through the site.

Volunteer duties include:
-Directing runners to the correct hand-off or relay exchange zone.
-Directing and assisting team vehicles for parking.
-Recording team numbers and clock times as racers enter the relay exchange zone.
-Assist and/or direct runners to food, water and restrooms.
-Assist in final clean up of site, including removing signage and trash.

If you are interested, please follow this link (find TMIRCE in the dropdown): https://ma.rtbrelay.com/reg_volunteer.php

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE Volunteers at Reach the Beach MA
